author: Arthur Willey
content: Kamchatka in ABSOLUTELY east of Russia, with a little north in there too!

author: glenwood weather
content: Sorry. Isn’t the Kamchatka Peninsula on the northeast coast of Russia?

author: glenwood weather
content:
” The reactor barge will be anchored at the Kamchatka Peninsula in the Arctic, northwest of Russia.”
Isn’t the Kamchatka Peninsula on the east coast of Alaska? Just west of Alaska?
The Kamchatka is known for its volcanoes.

author: Allan Smith
content: Hmm, a100′ rogue wave was just recorded off of Newfoundland Canada. I am sure the barge is immune to that too. (snark)
